value.name: LAPD Chief Charlie Beck addresses DTLA fatal pursuit shooting
value.description: The chase began around 9:30 p.m. in Cudahy, when Brian Newt Beaird, 51, of Oceanside, was spotted driving erratically behind the wheel of a silver Corvette. Police say Beaird wasn't speeding ...
